techmeme.title: Ticketmaster announces it will now show the full price of your ticket up front, ahead of the FTC's ban on junk fees, which goes into effect on May 12 (Emma Roth/The Verge)
E-commerce logistics startup Cart.com says it raised $50M, is now valued at $1.6B, is on track to cross $500M in revenue this year, and plans more acquisitions (Colin Campbell/Axios)
Coinbase will join the S&P 500, replacing Discover Financial Services, effective before trading on May 19; COIN jumps 7%+ after hours (Ari Levy/CNBC)
GM names Aurora co-founder and CPO Sterling Anderson as VP of global product and chief product officer, a newly created position at GM, starting on June 2 (Kirsten Korosec/TechCrunch)
Sources: the Trump admin is considering a sale of hundreds of thousands of US AI chips to UAE's G42 and is expected to unveil a deal with Saudi Arabia's Humain (New York Times)
